Poetic Translation (CAPL): You are my last; others are not worth you,

Lyrics (Orlando di Lasso): Puis que mon cueur est en vous seulement
Poetic Translation (CAPL): Because my heart only belongs to you.

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation (CAPL): Please be content with me; I'm yours all through:

Lyrics (Orlando di Lasso): Car le corps mort lesprit vous servira.
Poetic Translation (CAPL): When flesh is dead, my soul will still serve you.
